name: @adviser/runified
description: unified runtime which able to build in any modern language an should abstract the underlying runtime
author: Meno Abels <meno.abels@adviser.com>

scripts.build:aws: npx esbuild --bundle --sourcemap --format=cjs ./index.ts > index.js; zip lambda.zip index.js
scripts.create:aws: aws lambda create-function --function-name my-function --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip --handler index.handler --runtime nodejs18.x --role arn:aws:iam::973800055156:role/lambda-ex
scripts.invoke:aws: aws lambda invoke --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload file://payload.json --function-name my-function /dev/stdout | tee
scripts.build:oci: mkdir -p dist/oci ; npx esbuild --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap --format=cjs dist/transport/oci-function/oci.js > dist/oci/func.js
scripts.deploy:oci: pnpm run build; fn deploy --app runified
scripts.build:gcp: mkdir -p dist/gcp ; npx esbuild --bundle --platform=node  --format=cjs dist/transport/gcp-functions/index.js > dist/gcp/index.js
scripts.pubdir: pnpm run build; rm -rf pubdir ; mkdir -p pubdir; cp -pr ../.gitignore .npmignore package.json ../LICENSE ../README.md pubdir/; cd dist ; cp -pr . ../pubdir/
scripts.presmoke: pnpm run pubdir ; cd pubdir ; pnpm pack
scripts.smoke: cd smoke; rm -f package.json; pnpm init ; pnpm install -f ../pubdir/adviser-runified-*.tgz; pnpm dlx ts-node ./smoke.ts
